entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who crashed a cabinet over Filch's office to distract him.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the caretaker of Hogwarts school and was being distracted by Peeves.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nick is a ghost who helped Harry escape punishment from Filch.

entities.name: sir patrick
entities.description: Sir Patrick is someone who was involved in the Headless Hunt.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts school who was being punished by Filch.

relationships.description: Peeves crashed a cabinet over Filch's office to distract him.
Nick helped Harry escape punishment from Filch.
Sir Patrick was involved in the Headless Hunt.
Harry is grateful to Nick for helping him escape punishment.
